author: The great DXP
title: Arnold applauds Australia's solid defence
text:
Fri, 19 Jan, 2024
Doha: Graham Arnold praised his defence as Australia booked their place in the last 16 of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ with a 1-0 win over Syria at Jassim Al Hamad Stadium on Thursday, with Jackson Irvine’s goal guaranteeing the Socceroos’ progress from Group B.
[www.the-afc.com/en/national/afc_asian_cup/video/asiancup2023_|_group_b__syria_0_-_1_australia_1.html](www.the-afc.com/en/national/afc_asian_cup/video/asiancup2023_|_group_b__syria_0_-_1_australia_1.html)

[www.the-afc.com/en/more/photo/3003391.html](www.the-afc.com/en/more/photo/3003391.html)
Fri, 19 Jan, 2024
Doha: Jackson Irvine scored the only goal as Australia ground out a 1-0 victory over Syria at Jassim bin Hamad Stadium in Group B on Thursday to confirm their place in the knockout rounds of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™.
Fri, 19 Jan, 2024
Al Rayyan: Uzbekistan boosted their AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ knockout stage hopes after a 3-0 win over India in Group B on Thursday.
Fri, 19 Jan, 2024
Al Wakrah: Ten-man United Arab Emirates held on to earn a 1-1 draw against Palestine in Group C of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ at Al Janoub Stadium on Thursday.
Thu, 18 Jan, 2024
Doha: Head coach Amir Ghalenoei is expecting more of his Islamic Republic of Iran players when they take on Hong Kong, China in their second match of the AFC Asian Cup™ Qatar 2023 at Khalifa International Stadium on Friday.
Thu, 18 Jan, 2024
Doha: Shin Tae-yong will not be looking at the past when Indonesia take on Vietnam in Group D of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ on Friday.
Thu, 18 Jan, 2024
Doha: Iraq head coach Jesus Casas is fully aware of the formidable challenge awaiting his team when they play Japan in Group D of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ on Friday.
Thu, 18 Jan, 2024
Doha: Supachai Chaided believes Thailand’s 2-0 win over Kyrgyz Republic in Group F of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar™ 2023 is just the start of better things to come from the Southeast Asian side.
Thu, 18 Jan, 2024
Al Khor: Marquez Lopez was proud that defending champions Qatar became the first team to seal their place in the knockout stage of the AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™, saying the Maroons’ ability to cope with pressure was the reason behind their 1-0 win over Tajikistan on Wednesday.
Thu, 18 Jan, 2024
Doha: Miodrag Radulovic chose to focus on the positives after Lebanon played to a goalless draw with China PR in their AFC Asian Cup Qatar 2023™ Group A encounter on Wednesday.
